00022 
00023 void parse_input_file(FILE *f, Parameters *params)
00024 {
00025   if (f==NULL)
00026     return;
00027 
00028   char id[MAX_LINE_WIDTH];
00029 
00030   int seed_set=0;
00031   while (get_new_identifier(f,id))
00032     {
00033       if (strcmp(id,"population_size")==0)
00034         get_int_value(f,params->population_size);
00035       else
00036       if (strcmp(id,"max_generations")==0)
00037         get_int_value(f,params->max_generations);
00038       else
00039       if (strcmp(id,"problem_size")==0)
00040         get_int_value(f,params->problem_size);
00041       else
00042       if (strcmp(id,"replacement")==0)
00043         get_int_value(f,params->replacement);
00044       else
00045       if (strcmp(id,"tournament_size")==0)
00046         get_int_value(f,params->tournament_size);
00047       else
00048       if (strcmp(id,"bisection")==0)
00049         get_int_value(f,params->bisection);
00050       else
00051       if (strcmp(id,"num_bisection_runs")==0)
00052         get_int_value(f,params->num_bisection_runs);
00053       else
00054       if (strcmp(id,"quiet_mode")==0)
00055         get_int_value(f,params->quiet_mode);
00056       else
00057       if (strcmp(id,"verbose_mode")==0)
00058         get_int_value(f,params->verbose_mode);
00059       else
00060       if (strcmp(id,"random_seed")==0)
00061         {
00062           int seed;
00063           get_int_value(f,seed);
00064           setSeed(seed);
00065           seed_set=1;
00066         }
00067       else
00068         {
00069           printf("%s is an unknown identifier\n",id);
00070           exit(-1);
00071         };
00072     };
00073   
00074   if (seed_set==0)
00075     setSeed(123);
00076 }

00082 
00083 void param_help()
00084 {
00085   printf("List of parameters for input file (you can specify any subset):\n\n");
00086 
00087   printf("  -> Population size:\n      population_size = <number>\n\n");
00088   printf("  -> Problem size (number of characters):\n      problem_size = <number>\n\n");
00089   printf("  -> Maximum number of generations:\n      max_generations = <number>\n\n");
00090   printf("  -> Replacement (0=restricted tournament repl., 1=full repl.):\n      replacement = <number>\n\n");
00091   printf("  -> Tournament size for tournament selection:\n      tournament_size = <number>\n\n");
00092   printf("  -> Use bisection to optimize the population size:\n      bisection = <number>\n\n");
00093   printf("  -> Number of successful runs for optimal population sizing:\n      num_runs=<number>\n\n");
00094   printf("  -> Quiet mode (prints only the end-of-the-run summary):\n      quiet_mode = <number>\n\n");
00095   printf("  -> Verbose mode (do not use with redirected output):\n      verbose_mode = <number>\n\n");
00096   printf("  -> Random seed:\n      random_seed = <number>\n\n");
00097   printf("See example_input, example_input_bisection, and example_input_big for example input files\n");
00098 }

00105 int get_new_identifier(FILE *f, char *s)
00106 {
00107   char c=0;
00108   int n=0;
00109   int done=0;
00110 
00111   while ((!feof(f))&&(!done))
00112     {
00113       c=fgetc(f);
00114       if (((c>='a')&&(c<='z'))||
00115           ((c>='A')&&(c<='Z'))||
00116           (c=='_'))
00117         done=1;
00118     }
00119 
00120   if (done)
00121     {
00122       s[0]=c;
00123       n=1;
00124       done=0;
00125       while ((!feof(f))&&(!done)) 
00126         {
00127           c=fgetc(f);
00128           if (((c>='a')&&(c<='z'))||
00129               ((c>='A')&&(c<='Z'))||
00130               (c=='_'))
00131             s[n++]=c;
00132           else 
00133             done=1;
00134         };
00135       s[n]='\0';
00136 
00137       if (c=='=')
00138         done=1;
00139       else
00140         done=0;
00141 
00142       while ((!feof(f))&&(!done))
00143         {
00144           c=fgetc(f);
00145           if (c=='=')
00146             done=1;
00147         };
00148       
00149       if (!done)
00150         {
00151           printf("Expected '=' after identifier %s\n",s);
00152           exit(-1);
00153         }
00154 
00155       return 1;
00156     }
00157 
00158   return 0;
00159 }

00165 
00166 int get_int_value(FILE *f, int &val)
00167 {
00168   char line[MAX_LINE_WIDTH];
00169   fgets(line,MAX_LINE_WIDTH,f);
00170   sscanf(line,"%u",&val);
00171 
00172   return 1;
00173 }

00180 int print_parameters(Parameters *params)
00181 {
00182   printf("Parameters:\n");
00183   printf("  population_size    = %u\n",params->population_size);
00184   printf("  problem_size       = %u\n",params->problem_size);
00185   printf("  max_generations    = %u\n",params->max_generations);
00186   printf("  tournament_size    = %u\n",params->tournament_size);
00187   printf("  replacement        = %u\n",params->replacement);
00188   printf("  bisection          = %u\n",params->bisection);
00189   printf("  num_bisection_runs = %u\n",params->num_bisection_runs);
00190   printf("  quiet_mode         = %u\n",params->quiet_mode);
00191   printf("  verbose_mode       = %u\n",params->verbose_mode);
00192   separator(stdout);
00193 
00194   return 0;
00195 }
